about_the_game:
This is the playtest version!

Not everything below is in the playtest, but the first 8 puzzles are playable right now.

The year is 2013 in a universe very similar to ours, with the exception that humanity has made hundreds of years more progress in science and technology. Your road trip took a rough turn when a matter-phasing explosive round detonated in the street (which you were spared from by your skin embedded carbon nanostructure). You end up in a living metal structure used as a testbed for mechanical lifeforms (Mechforms). You will be challenged with puzzles originally designed for new AI to process and learn creativity. The human military is battling this great power and barely managing to make advancements through the city. You are lucky enough to have a chance alliance with the divergent Mechform Arc, who is indebted to you for saving his life. Now determined to forward your success, he will help your cause if your wits and problem solving skills are ready.

Special Features

VR and Standard Play Support

You do not need a VR Headset to play Fissure : Cubic.

Play in VR and use immersive controls for puzzle solving and physics interactions.

Play in Standard mode and enjoy enhanced graphics and a different movement style.

Specially Made Puzzles

Features a lot of puzzles crafted to work in interesting ways with the environment outside of the cube structures.

Evolution Algorithm

Robotic aircraft was fed through an "evolution" program I wrote that simulated wind pressure and sheer force with geometry "mutations" that affected the total wind resistance and outputted an altered version of human aircraft.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest 2, Valve Index, Windows Mixed Reality

short_description: Playable With/Without VR! A sci-fi 3D geometry based puzzle game. Alternate universe Earth history in a futuristic Type I Kardashev civilization setting. Puzzle mechanics featuring lots of advanced technology.
